enabled-comment: Enable or disable the health bar display.
targetOnlyHealthBar-comment: Show healthbar only for the target. Has limited range and is not impacted by Display Range
displayRange-comment: How far the entities can be for the healthbar. High values may lead to lag
showonplayer-comment: Displays the health bar on the player.
showhptext-comment: Displays numeric HP text inside the bar.
barwidth-comment: Width of the health bar in pixels.
barheight-comment: Height of the health bar in pixels.
verticalOffset-comment: Vertical offset of the health bar in pixels.
minScale-comment: Minimum size multiplier for health bars at high distance.
maxScale-comment: Maximum size multiplier for health bars when very close.
fadeinSpeed-comment: Time in seconds for the bar to fully appear.
fadeoutSpeed-comment: Time in seconds for the bar to completely fade.
midHp-threshold-comment: Below this percentage, the bar uses the mid health color.
lowHp-threshold-comment: Below this percentage, the bar uses the low health color.
midHp-color-comment: Bar color when health is between low and mid thresholds.
lowHp-color-comment: Bar color when health is below low threshold.
frame-color-comment: Frame/border color of the health bar.
